tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ClinicalTrials (
  trial_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  trial_name VARCHAR(255),
  enrollment_date DATE,
  completion_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ClinicalData (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  data_type VARCHAR(50),
  data_value TEXT,
  data_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE clinical_trials (
    trial_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trial_name TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    enrollment_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE patient_data (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name TEXT,
    age INT,
    gender TEXT,
    diagnosis TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE treatment_data (
    treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trial_id INT,
    patient_id INT,
    treatment_name TEXT,
    treatment_date DATE,
    outcome TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE clinical_trials (
  trial_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  treatment VARCHAR(255),
  trial_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(255),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE trial_results (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trial_id INT,
  patient_id INT,
  result_data TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE researchers (
  researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  researcher_name VARCHAR(255),
  specialty VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE clinical_trial_results (
    trial_id INT,
    patient_id INT,
    treatment VARCHAR(255),
    result VARCHAR(255),
    PRIMARY KEY (trial_id)
)

CREATE TABLE patient_data (
    patient_id INT,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    PRIMARY KEY (patient_id)
)

CREATE TABLE treatment_records (
    record_id INT,
    patient_id INT,
    treatment VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    PRIMARY KEY (record_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient_data(patient_id)
)

CREATE TABLE research_team (
    team_id INT,
    team_name VARCHAR(255),
    team_lead VARCHAR(255),
    PRIMARY KEY (team_id)
)

CREATE TABLE research_report (
    report_id INT,
    trial_id INT,
    team_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    findings TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (report_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (trial_id) REFERENCES clinical_trial_results(trial_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (team_id) REFERENCES research_team(team_id)
)
